title: Termination Schema
description: Defines a specific termination of a slab

chemical_elements.title: Chemical Elements
chemical_elements.description: Chemical elements at the termination. Can be a single element (e.g. 'Si') or a compound (e.g. 'SiO')

anyOf.description: A string representing a stoichiometric formula for surface atoms of a plane, e.g. 'SrTiO', 'SrO', 'O2' or 'Hf2O'

space_group_symmetry_label.title: Space Group Symmetry Label
space_group_symmetry_label.description: Space group symmetry designation for the termination
